DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass relationship adenomyosis/myoma low urinary tract symptom , sexual function gastrointestinal symptom .
DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Adenomyosis/Uterine Myoma Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: All outpatient patient find > 3 cm uterine myoma adenomyosis invite participate study . The size location uterine myoma adenomyosis uterus assess ultrasonography . Besides , enrol female patient ask complete overactive bladder symptom score , female bladder function ( UDI-6 & IIQ-7 ) , female sexual function index , bowel incontinence assessment questionnaire . In addition , patient underwent surgery myoma adenomyosis request complete questionnaire 3 month surgery . Women intact uterus assess ultrasonography . At least 30 woman age body mass index match without uterine myoma adenomyosis invite participate study control group .
DOC.criteria: < Women myoma adenomyosis > 1 . > 20 year old . 2 . Myoma : woman > 3 cm uterine myoma 3 . Adenomyosis : woman uterus several dark area ( lacunar area ) one uterine wall thicken uterine wall < The control group > Inclusion criterion : 1 . > 20 year old . 2 . Women without myoma adenomyosis < Both group > 1 . The patient low urinary tract infection acute intestinal inflammation . 2 . Previous surgery bladder urethra . 3 . History urinary tract stone tumor .
